vsParam:
This is not just flying,
I am travelling through space-time...

Ah, my name is Logix Ficsario.
Everyone calls me Logy.

Oh, we'll call you Logy too!
What did you do in your original world?

I am an alchemist, and I am just sent to Colseit
to be a government official...

Alchemist and government official!?
What exactly do you do?

Uh... I mainly investigate the periphery and ruins of the town.
And I'd handle the residents' commissions.

Oh I see. It's quite similar to what
we do here in the Academy!

Right, [px] is also an alchemy!
Can you show us the alchemy in your world?

We have an alchemical Cauldron,
and the ingredients should be readily available! How's that?

Ah, no... It's a pity that
I can't do alchemy which requires an alchemical Cauldron.
So your alchemy does not need an alchemical furnace?
Do you synthesize with your spirit?

Yeah. I'll tell you the details when we get a chance.
To me, using an alchemical Cauldron is more shocking.

No, that's not like it.
I can just relax if I could synthesize with my spirit.

Anyway... You use alchemical Cauldron for synthesis right?
I guess there's nothing I can do here...

No. Even if I can't synthesize, I still have alchemical knowledge.
And I can help you by collecting materials or other things.

Alright! We'll count it on you!
Thank you so much, Logy!
